name: Astral Web Inc.
description:
Astral Web was founded in 2008, with offices in Los Angeles, California, Petach Tikva, Israel and Taipei, Taiwan.
Proficient in English, Hebrew and Chinese, we serve Asian, North American, European and Israeli markets.  At Astral Web we know and understand American marketing models, use innovative thinking to promote our clients, and provide insightful strategic analysis, as well as improve the effectiveness of existing strategies.  We specialize in online marketing and web design with an emphasis on Magento, SEO (Search Engine Optimization), Pay-Per Click (PPC) and Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO).
As a group, we at Astral Web are passionate about the internet.  We believe that, with the power of far-reaching networks,  everyone has the opportunity to create a network business. We work hard to think of new and creative ideas to increase our customers’ revenue, and we hold ourselves to a high standard of excellent service.
